## Description

<!-- Brief description of what this PR adds or changes -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] New library item (publication/talk/report/patent)
- [ ] New collaboration
- [ ] New domain
- [ ] OSS catalog update
- [ ] Other

## Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] All external links are public and accessible (not behind authentication)
- [ ] No restricted, confidential, or internal-only information included
- [ ] Neutral, evidence-first tone (no marketing language)

### For Library Items
- [ ] Required front matter fields are complete (`title`, `year`, `type`, `venue`, `org_unit`, `domains`, `external_url`, `summary`)
- [ ] `external_url` points to a public artifact (arXiv, DOI, video, patent page, etc.)
- [ ] Domain tags match existing domain slugs in `_domains/`

### For Collaborations
- [ ] At least one public link is included
- [ ] Partner name is accurate
- [ ] Domain slug matches an existing domain

### Anti AI-Washing
- [ ] No adjectives without artifacts (claims like "cutting-edge" must link to evidence)
- [ ] Organization unit is used, not individual names
- [ ] Summary is factual and describes what problem/approach/evidence
